title: Little Mix
summary: Little Mix are a British girl group consisting of group members Jade Thirlwall, Perrie Edwards, and Leigh-Anne Pinnock; former member Jesy Nelson departed the group in 2020. The group rose to prominence by becoming the first group to win the British version of The X Factor in 2011. Little Mix's music style is of pop, R&B, and dance-pop, with influences from tropical house, Latin pop, and electronic music, and lyrics that have touched upon the themes of female empowerment, body positivity, and LGBT rights.
